newsitem.title: FRANCE: Usinor rises on profit forecast.
newsitem.headline: Usinor rises on profit forecast.

text.p: Shares in French steelmaker Usinor-Sacilor SA rose on Monday on the back of a profit forecast which seemed more bullish than a statement made in April.
At 0825, Usinor was up 1.61 percent at 97.65 francs after having set a year high at 99.90 francs.
Usinor chairman Francis Mer told a shareholders' meeting he expected a very slight drop in first-half results but better performance in the second half.
"The first-half result will not be very far from the same period last year, a little lower," he said.
In April, Usinor said the first half would be "poorer" than last year and in February he said the first half "would not be great".
